snippet: Washington’s automatic budget-cutting is hurting the courts and imperiling the federal public defender program.
abstract: Editorial laments that the madness of across-the-board budget cuts known as sequestration is causing real damage to the American justice system and particularly imperiling effective legal representation to poor people accused of federal crimes; urges Chief Justice John Roberts Jr to make a loud and forceful declaration about the damage that is being done to the courts.
lead_paragraph: Washington’s automatic budget-cutting is hurting the courts and imperiling the federal public defender program.
